pageTitle: J514: Hydraulic Tube Fittings - SAE International
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1284=Since many factors influence the pressure at which a hydraulic system will or will not perform satisfactorily, the values shown in SAE J1065 should not be construed as a guaranteed minimum.}
textBeforeTable: History: Section 6-Tables for Calculating Dimensions on Special Sizes Section 5-Adapter Unions (formerly in SAE J516) Section 4-Hydraulic Pipe Fittings (formerly SAE J926) Section 3-O-ring Plugs (for O-ring Ports see SAE J1926) Section 2-Flareless Tube Fittings Section 1-37 Degree Flare Tube Fittings The standard is divided into six sections as follows: For any application, it is recommended that sufficient testing be conducted and reviewed by both the user and fitting manufacturer to assure that performance levels will be safe and satisfactory. Since many factors influence the pressure at which a hydraulic system will or will not perform satisfactorily, the values shown in SAE J1065 should not be construed as a guaranteed minimum. These fittings are capable of providing leakproof, full flow connections in hydraulic systems operating at working pressures as specified in Table 1 for respective sections. This SAE Standard covers complete general and dimensional specifications for 37 degree flared and flareless types of hydraulic tube fittings and O-ring plugs. Also included are pipe fittings and adapter unions for use in conjunction with these tube fittings. These fittings are intended for general application in hydraulic systems on industrial equipment and commercial products. Scope: 54
